description: This rule detects the execution of Run Once task as configured in the registry Author: Avneet Singh @v3t0_, oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Run Once Task Execution as Configured in Registry
query: ((process.executable:*\\runonce.exe OR winlog.event_data.Description:"Run\ Once\ Wrapper") AND process.command_line:*\ \/AlternateShellStartup*)
